scripts.minify:html: bash -lc "shopt -s globstar nullglob; for f in site/**/*.html; do html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-style-link-type-attributes --minify-css true --minify-js true -o "$f.tmp" "$f" && mv "$f.tmp" "$f"; done"
scripts.build: npm run postcss:css && npm run build:mkdocs && npm run validate:html && npm run minify:html
